name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Obama was at the Vatican today. He had his first meeting with Pope Francis. It was a casual meeting. They spoke privately for about an hour and grabbed lunch at the Cheesecake Factory.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: It's traditional for world leaders to exchange gifts when they meet for the first time. The Pope gave Obama his book and two medallions. The president gave him seeds from the vegetable garden. The Pope said, "Great, my favorite."

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Lululemon is the company that makes yoga pants that are so tight they cut off circulation to the part of your brain that decides how much money is OK to spend on yoga pants.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: A lot of schools are banning the yoga pants because they're causing male students to go through puberty prematurely.
